name: GPT-4o Audio Preview (Dec 2024)
description: GPT-4o Audio Preview December 2024 release with 60% reduced audio token pricing and support for prompt caching, optimized for asynchronous audio input and output.
notes: December 17, 2024 update reduced audio token pricing by 60% (from $100/$200 to $40/$80 per 1M tokens). Added support for prompt caching at $2.50 per 1M tokens (87.5% reduction). Focused on text and audio modalities only - does not support image/vision capabilities.
